monster.name: Human Andras

trait.name: Assassinate
trait.text: During its first turn, Andras has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Andras scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: If Andras is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Andras instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
trait.text: The andras has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
trait.text: The andras deals an extra 13 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the assassin that isn't incapacitated and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and if the target is a humanoid, it must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.

action.name: Light Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and if the target is a humanoid, it must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.

monster.description: Conversing with Andras requires a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check or a speak with animals spell.
